synopsis.text: After years of unshakeable friendship, Haruka Takayama and Yuu Sonoda find themselves navigating the unfamiliar halls of Misato West High School, a school destined to close its doors in three years. Despite the looming closure and being seated at opposite ends of the classroom, the pair remain undeterred, determined to create unforgettable high school memories. As new friendships blossom, Haruka grows increasingly jealous, leading to a pivotal moment: a shared kiss in an empty classroom, a promise of a bond deeper than friendship. As they explore their evolving relationship, they must navigate the complexities of young love, all while preserving their unique connection. This heartwarming tale of friendship and love unfolds in the most unexpected ways, as Haruka and Yuu discover the depths of their feelings for each other amidst the backdrop of their school's impending closure.
